Name: Blueprint
Notes: Blueprint Digital Marketing is a Toronto-based agency specializing in SEO, PPC, content marketing, website design, and email marketing. Founded by Michael Cloke and Rahim Karsan, they help businesses grow through effective digital strategies.

Name: Apples & Oranges Analytics and Marketing
Notes: Apples & Oranges Analytics and Marketing is a Canadian digital agency specializing in SEO, social media, email marketing, and online advertising. They focus on mission-driven businesses in sectors like sustainability and regenerative agriculture, aiming for financial success and social impact.

Name: Synergy Interactive
Notes: Synergy Interactive Inc. is a digital marketing agency specializing in email marketing, lead generation, and HTML design. They serve clients across industries like casinos, publishing, and food services, offering campaign management and consulting.

Name: CommDesign
Notes: CommDesign is a Montreal-based design studio specializing in branding, graphic design, web design, and digital marketing. They offer creative services, strategic marketing, and SEO to help brands build strong identities and engaging digital presences.

Name: Out-Smarts
Notes: Out-Smarts is a woman-led digital marketing agency in Vancouver, specializing in SEO, website design, social media, paid media, email marketing, and consulting. They focus on helping organizations with a positive impact enhance their online presence and achieve business goals.

Name: VirtualAd
Notes: VirtualAd is a digital marketing agency that helps scale high-growth D2C brands through Facebook, Google, YouTube, email, and SMS strategies. They focus on lead generation, CRM optimization, and sales pipeline acceleration for select clients.

Name: Tylite Digital
Notes: Tylite Digital is a boutique agency in Toronto specializing in digital marketing for the entertainment and lifestyle sectors. They offer services like campaign strategy, content creation, social media management, and influencer partnerships to help brands engage audiences effectively.

Name: Stratégies
Notes: Stratégies is a marketing agency in Quebec specializing in relationship and cognitive marketing. They focus on personalized communication through email marketing, automation, and CRM to build trust and enhance customer loyalty.

Name: CJAM Marketing
Notes: CJAM Marketing connects businesses with vetted marketing agencies through a personalized matchmaking process. They offer a comprehensive vetting system, direct connections with agency founders, and ongoing support to ensure a successful partnership.
